author: Special Correspondent
text:
The honest gesture of Sundaram (45) of Gokulam colony in Singanallur, working in a private firm in Ram Nagar, came in for appreciation right from constable to the Commissioner when he handed over a bundle of currency notes in the denomination of Rs.1,000 that he found on road to the police.

According to the police, on Wednesday night Sundaram was walking along Ram Nagar near the Ramar Temple when he found a currency bundle on the road.

The bundle had Rs. 91,000. He just rushed to the Kattoor police station and handed it over there. The police are waiting for the owner to stake claim for the cash with adequate proof.
title: Man hands over cash found on road to police
